contexts.context: ...backing them up, demanded of Russia to relinquish any <mark>Korean</mark> influence and vacate Manchuria. The negotiations dragged on...
...As Chemulpo is only a few hours from the <mark>Korean</mark> capital Seoul away, Japan has already occupied it...
